assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Ethical approval was obtained from the National Medical Research & Ethics Committee (NMRR-19-2187-50020)). Informed consent was obtained from all participants for being included in the study. This study was performed in accordance with the Helsinki Declaration of 1975, as revised in 2000.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The authors declare no competing interests.
